page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY DAD
page.content: My Dad gets up at 6.30 in the morning and he puts the radio and the kettle on. Then he makes two cups of tea, one for himself and one for my Mum. Then he goes to the bathroom, has breakfast and goes to work at 7.45. My Dad is a docker and the type of work he does is loading and unloading the containers of cargo. The types of cargo are Steel, Bags, Cartons and Timber. At 12.00 he comes home for his dinner and at 1.00 he goes back to work until 4.30. On his way home he goes for a pint in the Reindeer pub. Then he gets home and cooks tea, after which he goes into the garage to make some window and door frames. When he has finished 1 or 2 he comes in and has a bath and then at about 8.30 he goes out to the pub. He comes in at 11.00 has a coffee then he goes to bed. This was written by Nicky Morrow.
